# Load packages

library(tidyverse)
library(igraph)

# Graphing religion
```{r}
religion <- as.matrix(import("/Users/naomiliftman/Desktop/GOV338/Final Project/Final Datasets/first models/matrix_religion_112.csv"))
religion_pt_2 <- graph.adjacency(religion, mode=c("undirected"))
plot(religion_pt_2)
```
